fixes.name: Accounts Above Threshold
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF that compares a row value to a parameter into a DAX measure. Replaced the parameter reference with SELECTEDVALUE('Balance Threshold'[Display As]) and transformed column references to the 'table'[column] format. The measure returns the AccountID when the CurrentBalance meets or exceeds the selected threshold, otherwise BLANK().
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references a Tableau parameter ([Parameters].[Balance Threshold]); per rules, any formula with parameters must be implemented as a measure.
